name: CVS HEALTH
sampleDescriptions: - Issues related to CVS Healths acquisition of Aetna
- Issues related to drug pricing

- Issues related to CVS Healths acquisition of Aetna
- Issues related to the competitive nature of the pharmacy benefit management industry. 
- H.R. 2376/S. 1227, The Prescription Pricing for the People Act of 2019

- Issues related to barriers to generic drug and biosmiliar market entry including pay-for-delay and REMS.
- S. 64, The Preserve Access to Affordable Generics Act of 2019
- S. 340/H.R. 965, The Creating and Restoring Equal Access to Equivalent Samples Act of 2019
- S. 659, The Biologic Patent Transparency Act of 2019

- H.R. 803/S. 988, The Improving Transparency and Accuracy in Medicare Part D Spending Act of 2019
- H.R. 1034/S. 640, The Phair Pricing Act of 2019
- H.R. 1614/S. 724, The John S. McCain Opioid Addiction Prevention Act of 2019
- S. 1895, The Lower Health Care Costs Act of 2019

- HEROES Act

- Issues related to CVS Healths acquisition of Aetna
- Issues related to liability protections for frontline workers, S. 4317 Safe to Work Act

- General education about the pharmacy benefit manager/pharmacy and insurance industry.
- Issues related to the implementation of H.R. 748, Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security Act (CARES Act), including provisions related to the treatment of patients.
- Issues related to surprise billing, including H.R. 3630, No Surprises Act and H.R. 3502, Protecting People From Surprise Medical Bills Act and extension of COBRA benefits.
- Issues related to retail organized crime enforcement including the INFORM Act, S. 936

- Issues related to liability protections for frontline workers
- S. 4317 Safe to Work Act
- H.R. 1418, The Competitive Health Insurance Reform Act
- Issues related to antitrust exemptions, and mergers and acquisitions

- General education about the pharmacy benefit manager/pharmacy and insurance industry.
- Issues related to the implementation of H.R. 748, Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security Act (CARES Act), including provisions related to the treatment of patients.
- Issues related to surprise billing, and extension of COBRA benefits.
- Issues related to H.R. 6800, the HEROES Act, including provisions related to testing and vaccines.
- American Rescue Plan, H.R. 1319.
